alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:23PM CDT until June 15 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Livingston, or 13 miles east of Denham Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Livingston, Albany, Springfield and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 20 and 49. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 15 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
